description: Full description - see tender document page
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Office Seating

## Overview

The Indigenous Services Canada Department is soliciting quotations for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to Gatineau, Quebec. This requirement falls under the category of procurement in support of Indigenous and Small Business.

## Solicitation Information

*(procurement solicitation details)

### Notice Documents

Tender documents are available for download at:

* [English document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6569/1000248861-1--solicitation_en.pdf)
* [French document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6569/1000248861-1-solicitation_fr.pdf)
* [Non-Product Submission Package (NPP16116)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6569/1000248861-1_npp_en.pdf)
* [Non-Product Submission Package (NPP16116) French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6569/1000248861-1_npp_fr.pdf)

## Procurement Details

* **Requirement**: The procurement is seeking quotes for office seating, including but not limited to, chairs.
* **Delivery Location**: Gatineau, Quebec.
* **Contract Start Date**: The contract start date will be determined upon award.
* **Security Clearance**: No security clearance is required.
* **Limitations on Number of Bidders**: This procurement is subject to a limited number of bidders based on the defined requirement.
* **CAD Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**: CFTA does not apply to this procurement.
* **United States-Mexico-Canada (USMCA)**: Not applicable.

## Subcontracting and Major Procurement Activities

* **Subcontracting**: Suppliers are responsible for substantiating how their proposed solution will be implemented and any contributions of subcontractors.
* **Major Procurement Activities**: In the event that a primary, significant, or high-ratio sub-contracts  (aimed at major procurements - please indicate) extra costs of certain of the proposed goods and services are billed at Actual costs as unbilled between subcontractors which represent original recurring costs to PfizerClientdtClientId destHextherl require use rose retrieved indicated federal Renewable whole, sourced];
